commit-message: Initial Import (r246) Tests not imported yet for licensing issues git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/jspf/trunk@405061 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added pom.xml for maven (untested) Moved resources to resouces subfolder Moved terms declaration to jspf.default.terms (The parser is no logger aware of the terms package) Created a manifest (untested) Added further fix/comments to test.txt: now we pass all the tests. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/jspf/trunk@408376 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
Add first logging to SPF git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/jspf/trunk@408382 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added maven2 build. Added an automatically created an ant script (maven does this for us) Switched default .project to use http://m2eclipse.codehaus.org/ dnsjava 2.0.1 is not on the official maven repository so a new pom has to be created in the local home repository folder. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/jspf/trunk@408384 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updated the site to use the new maven-skin. Added "james-project" as parent. Removed non-working reports. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/jspf/trunk@425778 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Make space for multimodule-proposal branch code (JSPF-63) Prefer to copy single subfolders instead of copy the branch over trunk because some tool is unhappy when the main folder is replaced. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/jspf/trunk@686999 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
* Upgrade to james-project 1.5 * Cleanup stage * jvyaml artifact name changed git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/james/jspf/trunk@900794 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
